# Officers of the Executive Committee
```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false

content = rowwise_table(
  ~name, ~image, ~url, ~text,
  "Christian Meisner", "presidents/img/christian_meissner.jpeg", "mailto:cameissn@iastate.edu", "President",
  "Randy Salekin", "presidents/img/randy_salekin.jpeg", "mailto:rsalekin@ua.edu",
  "President Elect",
  "Daniel Murrie", "presidents/img/daniel_murrie.jpeg", "mailto:murrie@virginia.edu",
  "Past President"
)
div(class = "officer-grid",
  pmap(content, function(name, image, url, text) {
    div(class = "officer-grid__item",
      div(class = "officer-grid__image-container",
        img(class = "officer-grid__image", src = image)
      ),
      div(class = "officer-grid__text",
        h3(class = "officer-grid__name",
          a(class = "officer-grid__link", href = url, name)
        ),
        text
      )
    )
  })
)
```
